column4: LTS means Long Term Support, as in, you'll recieve security updates for 3 years on the desktop, instead of 18 months.
Yes lots of bug fixes would be cool. An update/bugfix cycle even if there is no security issue.
right, bugfixes will happen throughout support
ubuntu does that to a point.  Like, Dapper was the last of this 'cycle', and as such, the most polished.  Edgy will start another one, and be wild and crazy.
